channel.title: HyBriD PvP v3 Corp Glitch
channel.description:
Hey guys, im gonna go through a step by step TuT for fixing Corporal Beast Glitch on hybridpvp v3 source, i have seen soooooooooo many posts on how do you do it and does anyone have a tut on it so heres a very easy one... pay attention. So im here to show you.
First, go into your source. Then (if using windows 7) search for npc.cfg file, if using a different OS it will be in souce/ Data/cfg. Open npc.cfg you will see corporal beast change his id to this 8133 and change his Hp to 2000. And your done. How easy was that now??? LOL! No negativity no matter how short the TuT was plz rofl.

item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

There’s also a bug that you can lure him into the wall kill him and loot him without getting damaged. Simple fix, either change the following distance or the spawn coords.

Read full topic

item.title: HyBriD PvP v3 Corp Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Venge_Drop Venge Drop
item.description:
@Venge_Drop wrote:

Hey guys, im gonna go through a step by step TuT for fixing Corporal Beast Glitch on hybridpvp v3 source, i have seen soooooooooo many posts on how do you do it and does anyone have a tut on it so heres a very easy one… pay attention. So im here to show you.

First, go into your source. Then (if using windows 7) search for npc.cfg file, if using a different OS it will be in souce/ Data/cfg. Open npc.cfg you will see corporal beast change his id to this 8133 and change his Hp to 2000. And your done.
How easy was that now???
LOL!
No negativity no matter how short the TuT was plz rofl.

Read full topic
